description: This file defines a RecyclerView.Adapter named NoteAdapter for displaying a list of Note objects in an Android application. It manages binding Note data to item views, handling item clicks, and updating the list of notes.

classes.name: NoteAdapter
classes.description: An Adapter for RecyclerView that displays a list of notes and handles user interactions.

classes.name: NoteViewHolder
classes.description: ViewHolder class that holds references to the views within each note item layout and binds Note data to these views.

methods.name: updateNotes
methods.description: Updates the list of notes and refreshes the RecyclerView display.

methods.name: NoteViewHolder
methods.description: Constructor initializing view references and click listener for a note item.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a Note object's data to the UI elements within a note item view.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the note item layout and creates a NoteViewHolder instance.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the ViewHolder at the specified position.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of notes.
